sentences.en: I sat inconspicuously in a corner.
sentences.cn: 我不起眼地坐在角落里。

sentences.en: Inconspicuously, I edged along the baseball field, then slipped into underbrush.
sentences.cn: 我躲躲闪闪地沿着棒球场的边缘向前走, 随后又消消地溜进了灌木丛.

sentences.en: The turmoil began inconspicuously on July 2 in Thailand.
sentences.cn: 这场风暴于去年七月二日开始在泰国出现,当时尚未引起太大注意.

words.tran_cn: 不显眼的；不引人注意的；（花）不显著的
